test_files.name: Company Background and Acquisition News Research
test_files.title: Company Background and Acquisition News Research

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL is https://stage.bluebirds.com/

phases.objective: Click 'Blog' link in the main navigation bar.

assertions.description: Verify that verify navigation to the blog page.
Verify that verify blog posts are listed on the page.

phases.objective: Navigate to Read the blog post titled 'Bluebirds Raises $5M Seed Round Led by Lightspeed to fix outbound sales'.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the specific blog post content is displayed.
Verify that verify the blog post title 'Bluebirds Raises $5M Seed Round Led by Lightspeed to fix outbound sales' is visible.
Verify that verify the current URL is https://stage.bluebirds.com/.
Verify that verify the 'Bluebirds is now part of Salesforce!' announcement is visible.

phases.objective: Click the 'Learn more' link next to the 'Bluebirds is now part of Salesforce!' announcement.

assertions.description: Verify that verify navigation to the Salesforce acquisition news page (expected to be an external link).
Verify that verify the page contains content related to the Salesforce acquisition.
Verify that verify the current URL is https://stage.bluebirds.com/

phases.objective: Click the 'Get started' call-to-action button prominently displayed on the homepage.

assertions.description: Verify that a contact or inquiry form/page is displayed after clicking 'Get started'.

test_files.name: Customer Success and Case Study Review
test_files.title: Customer Success and Case Study Review

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL is https://stage.bluebirds.com/

phases.objective: Click 'Our Customers' link in the main navigation bar.

assertions.description: Verify that verify navigation to the 'Our Customers' page.
Verify that verify the 'InterSystems' customer entry is visible on the page.

phases.objective: Navigate to On the 'Customers' page, click the 'Read case study' button associated with 'InterSystems'.

assertions.description: Verify that verify navigation to the 'InterSystems' specific case study page.
Verify that verify the 'InterSystems' case study title or key content is present.
Verify that verify the current URL is https://stage.bluebirds.com/

phases.objective: Scroll to the footer section of the page.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the footer section, containing legal links, is visible in the viewport.
Verify that verify navigation to the Privacy Policy page.
Verify that verify the presence of Privacy Policy related content or title on the page.
Verify that verify the current URL is https://stage.bluebirds.com/.

phases.objective: Scroll to the footer section of the page.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the footer section, containing legal links, is visible in the viewport.
Verify that verify navigation to the Terms & Conditions page.
Verify that verify the presence of Terms & Conditions related content or title on the page.
Verify that verify the current URL is https://stage.bluebirds.com/.

phases.objective: Scroll to the footer section of the page.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the footer section, containing legal links, is visible in the viewport.
Verify that verify navigation to the Trust Center page (expected to be external, e.g., Vanta).
Verify that verify the page contains security or compliance information.
Verify that verify the current URL is https://stage.bluebirds.com/

phases.objective: Click the 'Log in' link in the top right corner of the navigation bar.

assertions.description: Verify that verify navigation to the user login page or a login modal appears.
Verify that verify input fields for email/username and password are visible.
